headline: Exclusive: Cognizant CEO reveals Anthropic AI partnership
summary: In an exclusive interview with Ramzan Karmali, Ravi Kumar S, CEO of Cognizant, reveals a new partnership with AI firm, Anthropic. The professional services company will roll out Anthropic's Claude AI models to its 350,000 employees. He expects the deal will mean that his business will be able to provide better services to customers that will be driven by AI. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

headline: A Fresh Look at Cognizant (CTSH) Valuation Following Landmark Anthropic AI Partnership
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH) is stepping up its AI game by announcing an expanded partnership with Anthropic to bring the Claude family of large language models and agentic tools into its enterprise technology stack. The move targets faster and broader adoption of AI-driven business outcomes for clients and teams alike. See our latest analysis for Cognizant Technology Solutions. The Anthropic partnership arrives just after Cognizant delivered another solid quarter and ramped up...

headline: Can Cognizant’s (CTSH) Partnership With Anthropic Reveal Its True Edge in Enterprise AI Deployment?
summary: Cognizant announced it is leveraging Anthropic’s Claude large language models and related agentic AI tools to enhance enterprise client solutions and internal productivity, aiming to help customers progress from AI pilots to scaled business outcomes. This move underscores Cognizant's intent to accelerate AI adoption beyond experimentation, prioritizing industry-specific solutions, responsible deployment, and integration with existing customer infrastructure. headline: Cognizant Adopts Anthropic's Claude to Accelerate Enterprise AI Adoption at Scale and Deploys Claude to Drive Internal AI Transformation
summary: Cognizant (NASDAQ: CTSH) is now using Anthropic's Claude, one of the world's most powerful family of large language models (LLMs), to help its enterprise customers and internal teams move from AI experimentation to scaled business outcomes. This combines the Claude family of models and agentic tooling with Cognizant's engineering platforms and industry blueprints to help deliver measurable impact at enterprise scale.
